document.full_text: french president nicolas sarkozy will host technology titans, including facebook, google and amazon, at a summit to debate how governments can encourage innovation on the internet, while taming its excesses.
document.title: france to host internet leaders for "e-g8" talks
lines_and_colors: french president nicolas sarkozy will host technology titans, including facebook, google and amazon, at a summit to debate how governments can encourage innovation on the internet, while taming its excesses.
